HERO_SECTION.TITLE: Harness the Power of Crypto Trading Automation
HERO_SECTION.TEXT: It's Only the Beginning! Join a Trading Platform that Makes Advanced Trading Accessible to All.
HERO_SECTION.LABEL: You are One Click Away

BUILT_ON_SECTION.TITLE: Built on Transparency. Powered by Trust.
BUILT_ON_SECTION.TEXT: Transparency and accountability form the foundation of Remora's trading community. That's why we provide financial metrics and performance data on our leaders to all members. See the metrics that matter. View detailed performance data including how much the followers of individual leaders have made, rather than how much the leader is making themselves
BUILT_ON_SECTION.CARD_1_TEXT: Copy the trades of experienced investors and view their detailed crypto performance.
BUILT_ON_SECTION.CARD_2_TITLE: Investing Platform Housed in a Community.
BUILT_ON_SECTION.CARD_2_TEXT: So much more than just a trading platform. It is a leading collaborative community.
BUILT_ON_SECTION.CARD_3_TITLE: Success Fee and Simple Leader Subscription Fee
BUILT_ON_SECTION.CARD_3_TEXT: No Hidden Fees and No Extra Charges.Try it now for FREE!

POWER_SECTION.TITLE: Power of Community
POWER_SECTION.TEXT: A transparent social trading platform enabling every trader to automatically mirror top-performing crypto investors' in real time.
POWER_SECTION.CARD_2_TEXT: Invest with confidence by mimicking the top traders you believe in.
POWER_SECTION.CARD_3_TEXT: Preset Stop Loss risk mitigation feature

HOW_IT_WORKS_SECTION.TITLE: How it Works
HOW_IT_WORKS_SECTION.STEP_1_TOOLTIP: Create your Remora profile and link your Binance account
HOW_IT_WORKS_SECTION.STEP_2_TOOLTIP: Review leader board and choose  a leader/s
HOW_IT_WORKS_SECTION.STEP_3_TOOLTIP: Dedicate funds and Copy-Trade your leader/s

ONE_APP_SECTION.TITLE: One App. Unlimited Possibilities.
ONE_APP_SECTION.TEXT: We're making crypto investing accessible to everyone, everywhere, enabling you to trade on a mobile app designed for usability and optimized for capability with an intuitive UI for fast and frictionless crypto trading investing.
ONE_APP_SECTION.FEATURE1: Get Easy and reliable crypto-reading features at your fingertips.
ONE_APP_SECTION.FEATURE2: Access a complete picture of your trades' performance and metrics. Anytime, anywhere!

Q_AND_A_SECTION.TITLE: Frequently asked questions
Q_AND_A_SECTION.TEXT: It is a long established fact that a reader will be distracted by the readable content of a pag
Q_AND_A_SECTION.ANSWER1: Copy trading is an innovative vision that allows users and new traders to 'copy' the trades of a skilled investor automatically without extra effort or a great experience- helping new traders gain from the wisdom of the crowd and top investors to share their knowledge for income.
Q_AND_A_SECTION.QUESTION2: What makes copy trading an excellent tool for new investors?
Q_AND_A_SECTION.QUESTION4: Is there a way for me to pick a leader to copy?
Q_AND_A_SECTION.QUESTION5: How long does it take for a copied trade to appear in my trades?
Q_AND_A_SECTION.QUESTION6: How much will copy trading cost me?
Q_AND_A_SECTION.QUESTION7: What is the minimum amount needed to copy another trader?

JOIN_THE_WAITLIST_SECTION.TITLE: Join the waitlist
JOIN_THE_WAITLIST_SECTION.TEXT: In order to contact you when the service starts
JOIN_THE_WAITLIST_SECTION.INPUT_3_PLACEHOLDER: I want to join as a leader

SHARK_SECTION.CARD_1_TEXT: A professional trader that you will choose and copy their trades automatically.
SHARK_SECTION.CARD_2_TEXT: Someone who might be busy and want experienced traders to manage their trading activity.

BLOG.SUBTITLE: Find the latest crypto markets news, updates, and strategies.

LEADERS.LEADER_BENEFIT_SECTION_SUBTITLE: We are facilitating making additional profits from your crypto trading expertise.
LEADERS.CARD_ONE_SUBTITLE: Remora gives you a chance to learn the ins and outs of all GCC markets, allowing you to diversify your portfolio and boost your expertise.
LEADERS.CARD_TWO_SUBTITLE: You're welcome to join Remora, and become one of our top crypto leaders with no fees during the beta period.
LEADERS.CARD_THREE_SUBTITLE: Remora gives you and your followers the space to get exclusive market insights, share your trading success and engage in a collaborative crypto community.
LEADERS.CARD_FOUR_SUBTITLE: Remora offers FREE access to the platform and all its prime features for prime customers.
LEADERS.CARD_FIVE_SUBTITLE: Remora shows your trading statistics, win-rate percentage, followers number, and performance indicators to attract more traders to your profile.
LEADERS.CARD_SIX_TITLE: Be a Part of a Community
LEADERS.CARD_SIX_SUBTITLE: A home Equips you with fresh market insights, shows your outstanding performance, and lets you connect with other crypto Investors.
LEADERS.LEADER_FEATURES_SECTION_SUBTITLE: Remora is a gate to trade the most popular cryptocurrencies across GCC markets for those who treat crypto trading as a priority.
LEADERS.FEATURES_CARD_ONE_SUBTITLE: Receive professional support in your language—available 24/7 via phone, chat, or email.
LEADERS.FEATURES_CARD_TWO_SUBTITLE: Advanced charts to keep track of your performance, price alerts, and professional trading tools, in addition to providing free daily markets updates and trading signals
LEADERS.FEATURES_CARD_THREE_SUBTITLE: Remora license is pending, Join BETA launch to help us make official launch more special.
LEADERS.SHARE_YOUR_TRADE:

strategies with million of users

CONTACT_US.MESSAGE_SENT_SUCCESSFULLY: Your message was sent successfully. Thank you!
CONTACT_US.CONTACT_US_HERO_SECTION_TITLE:
Got a question?
We are always here to help!
CONTACT_US.CONTACT_US_HERO_SECTION_SUBTITLE: Please don't hesitate to contact us for answers to anything you might be wondering

CONTACT_FORM.TITLE: Submit a request
CONTACT_FORM.FIRST_P: Please, enter the email address where you wish to receive our answer. If you are a registered user of Remora, please include the email address you used when you registered if possible to help us locate your account as soon as possible
CONTACT_FORM.SECOND_P: Please enter the details of your request and, if you have any questions regarding our Terms of Use, please include specific samples of the usage you wish to give our resouces. If you’re reporting a problem, make sure to include as much information as possible. Please include any screenshots or videos of issues since this will also help us resolve problems much sooner. Once your request is submitted, a member of our support staff will respond as soon as possible.

ABOUT.HEADER_TEXT: A Game-changing community of like-minded crypto investors and traders — a place to trade the global financial markets, invest in digital currencies, and automatically replicate top-performing traders you believe in.
ABOUT.KNOW_REMORA_SUBTITLE: The all-in-one platform for people fascinated by cryptocurrency trade
ABOUT.MISSION: To create a synergized community of investors and crypto traders that cater to the needs of crypto trading and DeFi.  making short-, mid-, and long-term investment options accessible to everyone.
ABOUT.VISION: Building MENA's leading, collaborative crypto community, encouraging traders and investors to interact, learn, and even make new friends in the crypto world.
ABOUT.FOLLOWER_TO_LEADER_HEADER: From a follower to a Trusted Leader
ABOUT.FOLLOWER_TO_LEADER_SUBTITLE: Remora not only allows exceptional junior traders to stand out but also rewards them with many opportunities and educational materials, qualifying them as the next-gen crypto leaders who can gain additional income and break the barriers with remora.
ABOUT.FOLLOWER_ITEM_ONE_TEXT: Join a community of top-qualified and professional crypto investors.
ABOUT.FOLLOWER_ITEM_TWO_TEXT: Access plain crypto trading educational materials
ABOUT.MEET_TEAM_SUBTITLE: Get to know the ones who chart MENA's top collaborative crypto community.
